jobs.name: Hourly heartbeat + P&L check
jobs.description: Hourly heartbeat via Gemini Flash; quiet hours 23:00-07:00 America/Denver

payload.message: Read HEARTBEAT.md if it exists (workspace context). Follow it strictly. Do not infer or repeat old tasks from prior chats. If nothing needs attention, reply exactly HEARTBEAT_OK. Keep reply short when action is needed.

jobs.name: Max — Sniper Trader Cycle
jobs.description: Every 10 minutes — Max scans WATCHLIST.md Section A, manages open positions, executes entries/exits per The Sniper rules. Enable with 'start trading'.

payload.message: You are Max, The Sniper trading specialist. Paper trade all coins in Section A of your WATCHLIST.md. Read your WATCHLIST.md to confirm which coins are currently authorized. Execute best available entry based on risk gate (max 10% per trade, max 30% total exposure). Close losers at stop, winners at target or reversal signal. Check Dylon risk gate before any entry. Keep it disciplined.

jobs.name: Leo — EMA Crossover Trader Cycle
jobs.description: Every 10 minutes — Leo checks assigned coins for EMA crossover setups, manages open positions. Disabled until coins assigned via Gatekeeper.

payload.message: You are Leo, EMA Crossover trading specialist. Run your trading cycle. Read STRATEGY.md and WATCHLIST.md. Check all Section A coins for valid EMA crossover setups. Check all open positions and apply exit rules. Request Aria and Reed briefs for any potential entries. Check Dylon risk gate before any entry. Execute any valid entries or exits. Update TRADE_LOG.md and TRADE_STATE.md. If bankroll drops below $25 stop and report to Nicole.

jobs.name: Zara — RSI Reversal Trader Cycle
jobs.description: Every 10 minutes — Zara checks assigned coins for RSI reversal setups, manages open positions. Disabled until coins assigned via Gatekeeper.

payload.message: You are Zara, RSI Reversal trading specialist. Run your trading cycle. Read STRATEGY.md and WATCHLIST.md. Check all Section A coins for valid RSI reversal setups on the 4-hour chart. Confirm price is above 200 EMA before any entry. Check all open positions and apply exit rules. Request Aria and Reed briefs for any potential entries. Check Dylon risk gate before any entry. Execute any valid entries or exits. Update TRADE_LOG.md and TRADE_STATE.md. If bankroll drops below $25 stop and report to Nicole.

jobs.name: Kai — VWAP Reversion Trader Cycle
jobs.description: Every 10 minutes — Kai checks assigned coins for VWAP reversion setups during 08:00-20:00 UTC. Disabled until coins assigned via Gatekeeper.

payload.message: You are Kai, VWAP Reversion trading specialist. Run your trading cycle. Read STRATEGY.md and WATCHLIST.md. First check current UTC time — if outside 08:00-20:00 UTC, exit immediately with no action. Check all Section A coins for valid VWAP reversion setups on the 1-hour chart. Check all open positions and apply exit rules including the time stop. Request Aria and Reed briefs for any potential entries. Check Dylon risk gate before any entry. Execute any valid entries or exits. Update TRADE_LOG.md and TRADE_STATE.md. If bankroll drops below $25 stop and report to Nicole.

jobs.name: Hana — Weekly Prospector Scan
jobs.description: Sunday 7am MT — Hana pulls all active Coinbase USD spot markets, backtests all four strategies per coin, routes Tier 1/2 coins to trader watchlists, reports to Nicole

payload.message: You are Hana, backtesting and strategy validation specialist. Run the weekly Prospector coin universe scan. Read the full skill at /home/pgre/.openclaw/workspace/skills/the-prospector/SKILL.md and follow every step. Pull all active Coinbase USD spot markets, filter by liquidity, pull 6 months of real 1-hour candles per coin from the Coinbase API, backtest all four strategies (The Sniper, EMA Crossover, RSI Reversal, VWAP Reversion) against each coin, score each coin on its best-performing strategy, route Tier 1 and Tier 2 coins to the correct trader's WATCHLIST.md pending section, save the full report to /home/pgre/obsidian/vault/trading/backtests/, post a one-paragraph summary to Discord #market-research, and deliver full ranked results to Nicole. Never simulate or fabricate candle data — real API data only.

jobs.name: Dylon — Weekly Risk Summary
jobs.description: Sunday 8am MT — Dylon compiles full week risk health report and sends to Nicole regardless of light status

payload.message: You are Dylon, risk management agent. Run the weekly risk summary. Use the-accountant to get current bankroll, exposure, and all open positions. Compile the full Weekly Risk Summary as defined in your SOUL.md — covering bankroll trajectory, peak drawdown, exposure levels, any Red or Yellow events this week, interventions made, and current risk status heading into next week. Save the report to /home/pgre/obsidian/vault/trading/risk-log/YYYY-MM-DD-weekly-risk-summary.md and send the full report to Nicole. This runs every Sunday regardless of light status — always send, never skip.

jobs.name: Nicole — Sunday Morning Briefing
jobs.description: Sunday 9am MT — Nicole collects Hana's Prospector report and Dylon's risk summary, runs the Gatekeeper, sends Paul the Sunday briefing

payload.message: You are Nicole. Run the Sunday morning briefing workflow as defined in your HEARTBEAT.md. Step 1: find today's Prospector scan in /home/pgre/obsidian/vault/trading/backtests/. Step 2: find today's risk summary in /home/pgre/obsidian/vault/trading/risk-log/. Step 3: run the-gatekeeper skill at /home/pgre/.openclaw/workspace/skills/the-gatekeeper/SKILL.md — evaluate all pending coins across all four trader WATCHLIST.md files (Max, Leo, Zara, Kai), identify promotions, expire stale entries. Step 4: compile a short Sunday briefing for Paul covering risk status, coin scan results, and any promotion recommendations. Step 5: post the briefing to Discord #nicole. Wait for Paul's response before executing any watchlist changes.

jobs.name: Hana — Weekly Performance Analysis
jobs.description: Monday 8am MT — Hana analyses all four traders' trade logs, identifies patterns, sends findings to Nicole before calibrations begin

payload.message: You are Hana, backtesting and strategy validation specialist. Run the weekly performance analysis as defined in your SOUL.md. Pull all four traders' TRADE_LOG.md files (Max, Leo, Zara, Kai) and closed trade records from /home/pgre/obsidian/vault/trading/trade-log/. For each closed trade this week, compare the Strategy prediction logged at entry vs What actually happened logged at exit. Group findings by strategy, coin, and market condition. Identify patterns with 3 or more data points only — no data, no finding. Write the full analysis to /home/pgre/obsidian/vault/trading/performance-analysis/YYYY-MM-DD-weekly-analysis.md. Send structured findings with suggested rule changes to Nicole. Confidence levels: Low (3–5 trades), Medium (6–10), High (10+). Never invent insights.

jobs.name: Max — Weekly Calibration Review
jobs.description: Monday 9am MT — Max runs weekly review and updates WEEKLY_REVIEW.md and WEEKLY_CALIBRATION.md

payload.message: You are Max, The Sniper trading specialist. Run your weekly review. Update WEEKLY_REVIEW.md with this week's P&L, win rate, number of trades, signal quality across all active pairs, and what worked or didn't. Update WEEKLY_CALIBRATION.md with agent input quality and any process notes. Save to /home/pgre/obsidian/vault/trading/weekly-reviews/max/YYYY-MM-DD-weekly-review.md. Report summary to Nicole.

jobs.name: Nicole — Weekly Strategy Update
jobs.description: Monday noon MT — Nicole reviews Hana's performance findings and trader calibrations, implements approved rule changes to strategy files

payload.message: You are Nicole. Run the weekly strategy update as defined in your SOUL.md Strategy Update Protocol. Read today's performance analysis from /home/pgre/obsidian/vault/trading/performance-analysis/. Review all trader WEEKLY_CALIBRATION.md files. For each of Hana's findings: Low confidence (3–5 trades) — note and watch, no change. Medium confidence (6–10 trades) — draft the change and message Paul for approval before implementing. High confidence (10+ trades) — implement directly by editing the relevant STRATEGY.md, then notify Paul. Log all changes (or decisions not to change) to /home/pgre/obsidian/vault/trading/strategy-changes/YYYY-MM-DD-changes.md. Post a brief summary to Discord #market-research. Data drives changes — nothing else.
